column5: WOW, way earlier than all predictions. But it's been above normal temps.http://i943.photobucket.com/albums/a...ps3gumecv2.jpg

The sat pics from today, show the western half of the gouin is ice free, Hebert has a few days to go, My prediction was on or just before the 10th I would say I was spot on. Everyone will be good for the opener
By tomorrow it will ice free.
Hebert will not go full ice out in one day, Check out real color sat pics?

Yes I did check out the True Color sat images. What you're seeing on that image is cloud, not ice. See the attached True Color image from the 7th. The 3-6-7 band visualization version (posted earlier) show ice in the red spectrum. In any event, today, tomorrow, it will be gone. 3 weeks for me.. Can't wait.
Ron , all ice gone yesterday on the Gouin. Satellite don't lie. Can't wait. http://lance-modis.eosdis.nasa.gov/i...terra.367.250m
